name: part_005
file: tmp_【 3D LIVE 】The First Note【 #⁠音乃瀬奏生誕祭2025 】#hololiveDEV_IS #ReGLOSS [mt8AyISL9Ig]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Otonose Kanade performing an acoustic guitar version of the song 'Kanade' (奏) on stage.
Transition sequence showing the stage setup and title for the next song.
Otonose Kanade performing the song 'No title' on stage.

subtitles.original: その役目が僕を締め付けるなんて
subtitles.english: That such a role would stifle me...

subtitles.original: そう思ってた だけど今分かったんだ
subtitles.english: I thought so, but now I understand,

subtitles.original: 僕らならもう
subtitles.english: for us...

subtitles.original: 重ねた日々がほら 導いてくれる
subtitles.english: See, the days we've shared together will guide us.

subtitles.original: 君が大人になって その時間が
subtitles.english: As you grow into an adult, as that time...

subtitles.original: 降り積もる間に 僕も変わってく
subtitles.english: ...accumulates, I too will change.

subtitles.original: 例えばそこに こんな歌があれば
subtitles.english: For instance, if there's a song like this there...

subtitles.original: 二人はいつも どんな時も
subtitles.english: ...the two of us can always, no matter when,

subtitles.original: 繋がっていける
subtitles.english: ...stay connected.

subtitles.original: 突然不意に 鳴り響くベルの音
subtitles.english: Suddenly and unexpectedly, the bell rings.

subtitles.original: 焦る僕 解ける手 離れてく君
subtitles.english: Me in a hurry, hands unclasping, you moving away.

subtitles.original: 夢中で呼び止めて 抱きしめたんだ
subtitles.english: I called out frantically and held you tight.

subtitles.original: 君がどこに行ったって
subtitles.english: No matter where you go,

subtitles.original: 僕の声で守るよ
subtitles.english: I'll protect you with my voice.

subtitles.original: 君が僕の前に 現れた日から
subtitles.english: From the day you appeared before me...

subtitles.original: 何もかもが 違って見えたんだ
subtitles.english: ...everything began to look different.

subtitles.original: 朝の光も 涙も 歌う声も
subtitles.english: The morning light, the tears, and the singing voice...

subtitles.original: 君が輝きを くれたんだ
subtitles.english: ...you gave them all their radiance.

subtitles.original: 抑えきれない 思いをこの声に乗せて
subtitles.english: I'll put these uncontrollable feelings into this voice...

subtitles.original: 遠く君の街へ 届けよう
subtitles.english: ...and let them reach your distant town.

subtitles.original: 例えばそれが こんな歌だったら
subtitles.english: For instance, if it's a song like this...

subtitles.original: 僕らはどこに いたとしても
subtitles.english: ...we can stay connected,

subtitles.original: 繋がっていける
subtitles.english: no matter where we are.

subtitles.original: No title / 作詞・作曲：Reol
subtitles.english: No title / Lyrics & Composition: Reol

subtitles.original: ずっと夢見てた僕になれたかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if I've become the person I always dreamed of.

subtitles.original: とに帰れないとこまで来たみたい
subtitles.english: It seems I've already reached a point of no return.

subtitles.original: 自分の足で二段飛ばして
subtitles.english: Skipping two steps at a time with my own feet...

subtitles.original: そのもっと先へ駆けて行けるはずだから
subtitles.english: ...I should be able to run even further.

subtitles.original: Run away
subtitles.english: Run away

subtitles.original: 深くなる傷を縫いつけ
subtitles.english: Stitching up the wounds that grow deeper...

subtitles.original: 劇的に回り出す 慣れた痛み
subtitles.english: ...they dramatically start to spin, this familiar pain...

subtitles.original: 焦る呼吸をトビキリ
subtitles.english: ...this racing breath, extraordinary...

subtitles.original: 綺麗なふりして また
subtitles.english: ...pretending to be beautiful, once again.

subtitles.original: 何が正当？ 内乱エゴ 誰が間違った？ 曖昧なまま
subtitles.english: What's right? Internal ego. Who was wrong? Remaining vague.

subtitles.original: あんたが嫌いな あいつはきっとただそれだけで正解なんだ
subtitles.english: That person you hate is surely right just for that reason.

subtitles.original: 0点だって提言したって 全然納得できない理由（わけ）は
subtitles.english: Even if you declare it's a zero score, the reason I can't accept it at all is...

subtitles.original: 最前はいつだってここだった 最盛期は最初からなかった
subtitles.english: ...the front line was always here; there was no peak from the start.

subtitles.original: 緩やかに崩れ壊れていく
subtitles.english: Slowly crumbling and breaking apart.

subtitles.original: ゆるりゆるり首を絞めるより
subtitles.english: Rather than slowly, slowly strangling me...

subtitles.original: 昨日までの僕が殺されていく
subtitles.english: ...the me of yesterday is being killed off.

subtitles.original: 緩やかに離れ離れになる
subtitles.english: Slowly drifting apart.

subtitles.original: クラリ君に聞こえるのは 僕が知らない声になって
subtitles.english: Dizzily, what you hear becomes a voice unknown to me.
